Type.BattleDialog: Ready now? We’re here because we wanna live.
Stop complaining, and be thankful that we even get another minute.
If we take care of this right… We won’t be purged at the very least.
…Let’s head back. We’d better deal with this fast.
How many do we have left? Can you all stand?
Wouldn’t have mattered… where we die…
All because of that damn hothead…
Keep fighting to your last moment.
Is this all you could do?
Stay sharp if you don’t want to snuff it.
…Let’s deal with the rest quickly.
Survival matters the most. Focus.
…They’re using all kinds of techniques.
Not sure if it was such a good idea to come here…
Doubt this’ll make much difference other than where we die.
Why’d we work under that man…
He got us all in serious trouble.
If we find valuable intel, maybe there’ll be room for negotiation…
Done packing up here.
Tardiness won’t do us any good, let’s return as soon as possible.
Is this intel… gonna be good enough for a bargain?
Hopefully they’ll forgive us…
Nowhere else we can go now…
Why do we have to take the fall…
Those freaks… How’d they get so much power…
Either choice was a losing bet…
Maybe I should’ve tried… running away…
…Guess I gotta accept this loss.
What a mess we’ve gotten into.
Shouldn’t we just call it quits and cut our losses?
Oh now isn’t this just fantastic!
Gotta press on anyhow…
This is getting worse than I thought.
We should hurry up and get over this.
They might take us back if we’re fast enough.
How’d we end up doing this…
It’s too early to let our guard down.
Pierce the right spot… to end it for certain.
